pkgmetadata.longdescription: Longitudinal Imputation of Categorical Variables via a Joint Transition Model // Imputation of longitudinal categorical covariates. We use a methodological framework which ensures that the plausibility of transitions is preserved, overfitting and colinearity issues are resolved, and confounders can be utilized. See Mamouris (2023) doi:10.1002/sim.9919 for an overview.
